document_data.mainbody: Natal Peacethorn was Janesta Leafgraces friend. On , while studying standing stones that showed the path to a Causeway, they found the mist between the stones dissipating and the path open for the first time. Entering, they saw the Gate of Stardeep. The day after, their encampment was attacked by Empyrean Knights, leaving his friend Janesta as the only survivor. During the attack, she saw him dragged out of his home.
